name: Trail of the Dead
description:
Your objective: SURVIVE. To do this, you must kill zombies by any means necessary. Call in airstrikes, repair vehicles you find along your journey, and manage your health by maintaining how much food you eat and how much you rest. Your life depends on how much ammo, clothes, and medkits you have at your disposal. You're our last hope! If you don't make it, we will drop the nuke! Good luck!

Computer

  • Arrow Keys: Move Character
  • A Key: Call Air Strike
  • H Key: Drive Humvee
  • P Key: Pause Game
  • Space: Shoot
  • Pause Game / Mute: Press icons in middle of screen, below game area

Mobile

  • Character Movement: Trackpad at bottom left (inside green square) drag your finger in this area to move your character
  • Shoot: Touch the crosshair icon at the bottom right of screen
  • Drive Humvee / Call Air Strike: Press text in middle of screen when it displays
  • Pause Game / Mute: Press icons in middle of screen, below game area
